Package io.github.woodenbell.blix

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RequestHandler
    The interface for the request handler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EncodingReference
    This class contains all the URL codes for characters, used internally to decode URLEncoded.
    FormParser
    Internally used class that parses form data found in the request body.
    HttpRequest
    The class representing the client request to the server.
    HttpResponse
    The class representing the HTTPResponse to the client, used to write the response and send the headers and status code.
    Main
    This is the main class for running a static server.
    ParsedFormData
    The class representing each parsed piece of data in the form data body.
    Server
    The class that represents the server and is responsible for receiving the requests and passing then to the handlers or static files.
    ServerConfig
    This class contains the basic server configurations.
